item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: The Stanford Emotional Narrative Dataset (SENDv1)
item.description:
Dataset link: https://github.com/StanfordSocialNeuroscienceLab/SEND Journal: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8913483 No of clips: 112 (Original = 193) Ethnicity: 33% White or Caucasian, 12% East Asian, 8% Hispanic or Latino/a, 6 % South Asian, 4% Black or African American, and 2% Middle Eastern, 35% mixed heritage or “Other” Annotation: Self-reported valence, Observers' valence, AUs by Emotient, acoustic features by eGeMAPS, linguistic features GloVe embeddings

This website provided several dynamic facial data for academic purposes.
